content: irishknitcat designs slotted scarf this simple quick-knit scarf makes an excellent gift finished measurements length approximately 30 to 30 width ends about 5 center about 3 measurements are not critical ©2009 jane irish nelson ~ irishknitcat designs materials any lightweight worsted or dk yarn that will knit to the given gauge patterned yarns that change colors are particularly fun to use pattern uses approximately 110 yards so can usually be knitted from just one skein sample scarves were knit in crystal palace taos 128 yards per 50 gram skein us #7 needles or size needed to give gauge although gauge is not critical for this pattern spare needle to hold resting sts gauge 5 sts and 5 ridges = 1 in garter st on #7 needles abbreviations k = knit p = purl sts = stitches k2tog = knit 2 together p2tog = purl 2 together m1 = make 1 by placing a backwards loop on needle skp = slip 1 st k2 decrease pass slip st over seed stitch worked in row on an uneven number of sts all row k1 p1 repeat to last st k1 seed stitch worked in row on an even number of sts row 1 k1 p1 repeat to end row 2 p1 k1 repeat to end pattern note when working in garter st slip first st of each row purlwise with yarn in front cast on 3 sts knit to last st m1 k1 repeat this row until there are 25 sts on needle scarf should meas about 4¾ to 5 wide work even for 3¼ to 3½ divide for slot k1 sl next st to spare needle p1 sl next st to spare needle 12x k1 cont working on these 13 sts in seed st for 2 18 row cut yarn return to the 12 sts on spare needle and work in seed st for 2 ©2009 jane irish nelson ~ irishknitcat designs rejoin and decrease knit decrease 1 st from each needle 2x k1 from front needle k1 from back needle knit decrease 1 st from each needle 3x k1 from front needle knit decrease 1 st from each needle 3x k1 from front needle k1 from back needle knit decrease 1 st from each needle 2x 15 sts cont in garter st for desired neck length probably somewhere between about 13 and 15 scarf will stretch with use decrease row k1 p1 k1 p2tog k1 p1 2x k1 p2tog k1 p1 k1 cont in seed st for 2 increase row k1 m1 12x k1 cont in garter st for 3¼ to 3½ decrease knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 repeat this row till 3 sts remain skp fasten_off finishing weave in ends enjoy ©2009 jane irish nelson ~ irishknitcat designs
